tiers.name: Low-Risk Reuse
tiers.description: Minimal testing required - inherently non-combustible or naturally fire-resistant materials
tiers.descriptionNO: Minimal testing p√•krevd - iboende ikke-brennbare eller naturlig brannsikre materialer
productTypes: Solid wood furniture (thick hardwood = naturally fire-resistant)
tiers.testingRequired: Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS) only - no flame testing needed
tiers.testingRequiredNO: Kun Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS) - ingen flammetesting

tiers.name: Medium-Risk Reuse
tiers.description: Strategic testing required - reupholstered furniture with new fire-rated fabrics
tiers.descriptionNO: Strategisk testing p√•krevd - rem√∏blert med nye brannsikre tekstiler
productTypes: Reupholstered furniture (reuse frame + NEW fire-rated fabric)
Hard seating (wood chairs with thin cushions)
productTypesNO: Rem√∏blerte m√∏bler (gjenbruk ramme + NY brannsikker tekstil)
tiers.placement: Restaurants, conference rooms, lobbies (NOT escape route corridors)
tiers.testingRequired: EN 1021-1 (cigarette test) + potentially EN 1021-2 (match test) for upholstery fabrics
tiers.strategy: YLLW reupholsters with Kvadrat, Gabriel, Maharam fire-rated contract fabrics (EN 1021-1/2 certified). Test certificate from textile supplier satisfies requirement. Frame reuse + compliant textile = approved system.
tiers.strategyNO: YLLW rem√∏blerer med Kvadrat, Gabriel, Maharam brannsikre kontrakt-tekstiler (EN 1021-1/2 sertifisert). Testsertifikat fra tekstil-leverand√∏r tilfredsstiller krav. Ramme-gjenbruk + godkjent tekstil = godkjent system.

tiers.name: High-Risk Reuse
tiers.description: Extensive testing/avoidance - NOT recommended for escape routes
tiers.descriptionNO: Omfattende testing/unng√•else - IKKE anbefalt for fluktveier
productTypes: Fully upholstered furniture (sofas, lounge chairs, thick cushions)
productTypesNO: Fullt polstret m√∏bler (sofaer, lenestol, tykke puter)
tiers.placement: AVOID in escape routes; use in guest rooms instead
tiers.placementNO: UNNG√Ö i fluktveier; bruk i gjestev√¶relser isteden
tiers.placementWarning: BBR requires B-s1,d0 for corridor walls/ceilings; upholstered furniture in corridors discouraged
tiers.placementWarningNO: BBR krever B-s1,d0 for korridor-vegger/tak; polstret m√∏bler i korridorer frar√•des
tiers.cost: Per product testing - often not economically viable
tiers.costNO: Per produkt testing - ofte ikke √∏konomisk levedyktig
tiers.recommendation: AVOID in escape routes; relocate to guest rooms
tiers.recommendationNO: UNNG√Ö i fluktveier; flytt til gjestev√¶relser

alternatives.description: Lower fire requirements (D-s2,d0 for surfaces; loose furniture = no specific Euroclass)
alternatives.descriptionNO: Lavere brannkrav (D-s2,d0 for overflater; l√∏se m√∏bler = ingen spesifikk Euroclass)

alternatives.description: Buildings with full sprinkler systems = relaxed furniture requirements (equivalence approach)
alternatives.descriptionNO: Bygninger med fullstendig sprinkler-system = lempede m√∏belkrav (ekvivalens-tiln√¶rming)

alternatives.description: Ett Hem, Hobo Hotel used vintage upholstered furniture via sprinkler + compartmentation strategy
alternatives.descriptionNO: Ett Hem, Hobo Hotel brukte vintage polstret m√∏bler via sprinkler + seksjonerings-strategi

testingLabs.name: SP
testingLabs.fullName: SP Technical Research Institute of Sweden

fireConsultants.name: Piacon
fireConsultants.specialty: Fire safety strategy for hotel projects

regulations.name: Swedish Building Regulations - Fire Safety
regulations.applicability: All Swedish hotel construction and renovation
keyRequirements: Sprinkler systems may allow equivalence approaches

authorities.name: R√§ddningstj√§nsten
authorities.responsibility: Fire safety approval for building permits
authorities.processStep: Pre-application meeting recommended for vintage furniture projects

costImplications.recommendation: Often not economically viable; better to avoid

bestPractices.title: Design fire-critical spaces around Tier 1 & Tier 2 reuse
bestPractices.description: Maximize non-combustible and reupholstered furniture in corridors and public areas

bestPractices.title: Relocate Tier 3 items to guest rooms
bestPractices.description: Guest rooms have lower fire requirements (D-s2,d0) making vintage upholstered furniture more viable

bestPractices.title: Start testing during design development
bestPractices.description: Begin fire testing before construction tender to avoid project delays (8-10 weeks minimum for multiple products)

bestPractices.title: Leverage sprinkler systems for equivalence
bestPractices.description: Buildings with full sprinkler systems may use alternative compliance pathways (precedent: Ett Hem, Hobo Hotel)

bestPractices.title: Engage fire consultant early
bestPractices.description: Pre-application meeting with R√§ddningstj√§nsten + Piacon/White Arkitekter can identify viable strategies before design is locked

precedents.approach: Vintage upholstered furniture in guest rooms via sprinkler + compartmentation strategy
precedents.relevance: Demonstrates equivalence pathway for Tier 3 furniture in guest rooms
Swedish precedent for vintage hospitality interiors

precedents.approach: Ocean plastic furniture (Mater Design) - new from recycled materials
precedents.outcome: Full compliance with hospitality fire standards
precedents.relevance: Demonstrates that circular materials CAN meet hospitality fire requirements (though this was new manufacturing, not reuse)
